transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir. IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu, Kashyap sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Hmm boliye.
Executive: Sir abhi beech mein aapne apna account diya tha jo dekh rahe the account aapka IndiaMART ka. Lekin meri unse baat hui to bol rahe the ki baad mein aap hi dekhenge account.
Customer: Haan woh main hi dekhunga. Woh nahi dekh raha, usko interest nahi hai, bol raha mere ko interest nahi hai. Abhi kya bolega.
Executive: Interest sir pata hai interest agar jaise ki aapne number diya tha humein September mein, theek hai? September mein maine samjhaya, keval do din hi IndiaMART use kiya sir. Do din mein keval chhe buyleads consume kari. Chhe leads sir.
Customer: Haan usko woh na bol raha, mere ko interest nahi hai. Mere ko usko samjhaya, sikhaya sab kuch kiya but usko interest hi nahi hai. Abhi mere ko hi karna padega. Karta hu, karta hu madam main karta hu. Main baat karunga pakka main hi karunga. Main bhi karunga to bahut ho jayega mere hisab se. Main bhi karunga na to ho jayega na.
Executive: Haan. Nahi sir agar aap din ka paanch minute bhi denge na IndiaMART ko phone se hi, bahut sahi rahega sir.
Customer: Malum hai.
Executive: Aapke phone mein IndiaMART download hai sir?
Customer: Haan hai na.
Executive: Toh ek minute aap open toh kariye IndiaMART. Main guide karti hu aapko kaise kya karna hai. Do teen pointers hi aapko yaad rakhne hai hamesha bas sir.
Customer: Hmm open karo, ek second haan.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Hmm khola boliye.
Executive: Theek hai, buyleads section pe jaaiye sir. Buyleads mein upar recent ka filter lagana hai aapko.
Customer: Buyleads karke hai hi nahi koi section.
Executive: Jaise ki IndiaMART ke andar search buyleads nahi hai na?
Customer: IndiaMART login kiya, neeche chaar option likh ke aa rahe honge na, home, buyleads, lead manager.
Executive: Haan buyleads, theek hai, buyleads pe hi hu main, boliye.
Executive: Ab upar recent ka filter lagaiye. Recent.
Customer: Recent, okay.
Executive: Haan. Ab aapko buyleads dikh rahi hogi ek Gujarat ki, hai na? Everler baby wipes 80 pieces. Toh yeh hamare kaam ki lead hai ki nahi sir? Yeh chaar ghante pehle buyleads post hui hai IndiaMART par.
Customer: Ah, yeh kya hai? 100 piece madam nahi possible hai. Yeh log jo bhej rahe hai na baby wipes 80 piece.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh right side pe jo ek option hai na, not relevant karke. Click kariye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usme likhiye I do not deal in low order value. Toh kya hoga aage se aapko bulk wali buyleads aayengi sir.
Customer: Kahan pe, kahan pe madam right hand side pe kidhar hai?
Executive: Delete wala jo option dikh raha hoga na ek dustbin type ka. Click kariye usme. Fir usme seven options open honge. Ek option hai I do not deal in low order value.
Customer: Submit kar diya.
Executive: Haan sir. Theek hai. Toh jaise ki aapne bola 100 piece toh aapke liye possible nahi hai, hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Upar aapko ek filter option dikh raha hoga sir order value ka. Ab aap 25000 above 50000.
Customer: Above 50000. Kar diya maine.
Executive: Haan. Choose kariye aap. Wahan pe kal ek buyleads post hui thi feeding bottle ki. Jiska aapka order hai 95000 se 125000.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Samajh gaya madam.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap isko consume kariye. Contact buy now pe click kariye ispe aap.
Customer: Kiya maine. Ka kar diya hai but woh shayad tak.
Executive: Aur reply bhi bhejiye sir.
Customer: Reply matlab ki jo ek send karne ka option rehta hai na.
Executive: Haan haan reply kar dunga.
Customer: Reply kar diya uska main copy karke usko bhej bhi deta hu.
Executive: Haan toh aapko daily bas yahi karna hai. Buyleads section open karna hai. Recent ka filter lagana hai. Recent mein kya hoga ki jo instantly buyleads post hoti hai ek minute pehle, do minute pehle woh dikhti hai aapko. Order value ka filter lagane se bulk lead dikhti hai. Agar in case profile pe kabhi lead proper nahi dikh rahi hai toh jitni bhi lead dikh rahi hai aap unko na not relevant mark kijiye taaki hamara jo system hai woh aapko feedback le paaye aur aage se aapko relevant lead de paaye sir.
Customer: Theek hai, samajh gaya.
Executive: Ek baby spoon ki bhi hai sir. Pack of 50 pieces.
Customer: Baby spoon nahi woh woh mera nahi hai. Woh mera related nahi hai. Woh steel mein chahiye usko. Ek toh Kolkata ka maine kar diya.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Kolkata ka kiya hai abhi main above 10000 wala karta hu. Usme kya hai chota chota order jo bhi aayega feeding bottle hota hai na madam. Toh woh ek baar hum kar sakte hai but woh plastic kabhi plastic king feeding bottle 100 piece. 200 piece ko hum 288 piece usko minimum bol sakte hai ki bhai 288 piece le lo. Waisa.
Executive: Haan. Hai na? Toh woh kya woh.
Customer: Top pe click karke dekhiye aapko problem aati hai. 5 minute start hoti hai.
Executive: Kyunki kya rehta hai na jo client active nahi rehta hai na usko utni leads nahi aati hai sir.
Customer: Nahi aati hai, samajh gaya madam. Samajh gaya main.
Executive: Theek hai. Agar aap bole toh main aapko WhatsApp pe message dal dungi daily buyleads consume karne ke liye.
Customer: Okay madam kar do.
Executive: Baaki aapko jab bhi time mile toh aap paanch minute use kar lijiye IndiaMART, theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai, thank you madam.
Executive: Theek hai. Okay, thank you sir.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not actively using IndiaMART.

- Was receiving irrelevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive guided on using recent filter.

- Executive guided on marking irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive guided on setting order value filter.

- Executive offered to send daily WhatsApp messages.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send daily WhatsApp messages.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filter, order value, not relevant
